mapper.select: select substring(to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), 0, 11) as date, count(*) as order_cnt, count(distinct policy_no) as pol_cnt, sum(org_price) as org_price, sum(dc_price) as dc_price, sum(total_price) as total_price from order_list group by date order by date desc

select (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS no, date_trunc('week', start_date) as week_start, date_trunc('week', start_date) + '6 days' as week_end, count(*) as order_cnt, count(distinct policy_no) as pol_cnt, sum(org_price) as org_price, sum(dc_price) as dc_price, sum(total_price) as total_price from order_list group by week_start order by week_start desc;

select (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS no, to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM') as year_month, count(*) as order_cnt, count(distinct policy_no) as pol_cnt, sum(org_price) as org_price, sum(dc_price) as dc_price, sum(total_price) as total_price from order_list group by year_month order by year_month desc;

select ol.policy_no as policy_no, sp.policy_title as policy_title, sp.standard as standard, sp.visible as visible, sp.price as price, sum(ol.month_count) as order_cnt, sum(ol.org_price) as org_price, sum(ol.dc_price) as dc_price, sum(ol.total_price) as total_price from order_list ol, subscription_policy sp where ol.reg_date >= to_timestamp(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and ol.reg_date > to_timestamp(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') group by policy_no, policy_title, sp.no, price having ol.policy_no = sp.no order by total_price desc
